judges: Before Steen, C. J,,Steaene, Jones, Bell, Chidsey and Musmanno, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
After careful consideration of the record and merits of this case, the judgment of the Superior Court is affirmed on the opinion of Judge Reno, 172 Pa. Superior Ct. 510, 94 A. 2d 128.
Mr. Justice Musmanno dissents.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Harry B. Back, with him Back & Levy, for appellant.

Malcolm W. Berkowitz, Assistant District Attorney, with him Samuel Dash, Assistant District. Attorney, Michael von Moschzisker, First Assistant District Attorney and Richardson Dilworth, District Attorney, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth, v. Knox, Appellant.
June 26, 1953:
Argued May 25, 1953.
Before Steen, C. J,,Steaene, Jones, Bell, Chidsey and Musmanno, JJ.
Appeal, No. 208,
reargument refused July 16, 1953.
Harry B. Back, with him Back & Levy, for appellant.
Malcolm W. Berkowitz, Assistant District Attorney, with him Samuel Dash, Assistant District. Attorney, Michael von Moschzisker, First Assistant District Attorney and Richardson Dilworth, District Attorney, for appellee.
